title: My friend[reward]
body: So my friend is pissed because I got my reward on my main account since he still waiting for his reward. {{item:3632}} and yes he's gold and put  much stress into this to get the rewards[Hódór] my best friend EU/NEs{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
Your friend will have to tap into their patience for a bit longer. As stated on the [EUNE Server Status Page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune), we're aware of some issues with ranked rewards and are looking into a fix. I'm unable to provide an estimated ETA on when that fix will roll out, but I wanted to let you know.

Let me know if you have any questions.
